name: Ilham Yahya Mahendra- Student Electronic Engineering
description: Student in Electronic Engineering Program at Politeknik Negeri Semarang, with a strong interest in developing systems based on both hardware and software. Experienced in the installation, repair, and maintenance of electronic systems, particularly through practical projects, research activities, and competitions. I'am is known for being detail-oriented, analytical, and capable of solving technical problems efficiently. Actively involved in research and development, he has a deep interest in smart technologies and the Internet of Things (IoT). This portfolio serves as a documentation of his various works, projects, and academic activities as a contribution to technological development and its real-world applications.
